Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Interface GameInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameInterface
Interface representing a Game. It allows to set the current player and perform moves.

  • Method Details

    • setCurrentPlayer

      void setCurrentPlayer(String nickname)
      Sets the current player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the new current player.

    • canTakeItemTiles

      boolean canTakeItemTiles(List<Position> positions)
      Checks if the list of Positions can be selected from the LivingRoom by the current player.
      Parameters:
      positions - List of Positions chosen by a player.
      Returns:
      true iff the column is available, false if otherwise.

    • selectItemTiles

      List<Item> selectItemTiles(List<Position> positions)
      Extracts a list of Item, chosen by the current player, from the LivingRoom, and assigns to the current player.
      Parameters:
      positions - List of Positions chosen by the current player.
      Returns:
      The Items selected from the LivingRoom.

    • canInsertItemTilesInBookshelf

      boolean canInsertItemTilesInBookshelf(int column, List<Integer> order)
      Checks if we can insert the chosen elements in column and in the given order.
      Parameters:
      column - The column of the bookshelf.
      order - A permutation representing the order to insert the elements in.
      Returns:
      true iff the move is valid.

    • insertItemTilesInBookshelf

      void insertItemTilesInBookshelf(int column, List<Integer> order)
      Inserts the items selected by the current player in their Bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      column - The column to insert in.
      order - List representing the order of the Items to insert in Bookshelf.

    • isEndingTokenAssigned

      boolean isEndingTokenAssigned()
      Checks if the ending token was assigned to any of the players.
      Returns:
      true iff there is a player that owns the ending token.

    • getPublicScore

      int getPublicScore(String nickname)
      Gets the Player's public score (bookshelf, common goals and ending token).
      Parameters:
      nickname - The Players's nickname.
      Returns:
      The public score of the Player.

    • getPersonalScore

      int getPersonalScore(String nickname)
      Gets the Player's personal score(personal goal).
      Parameters:
      nickname - The Player's name.
      Returns:
      The personal score of a Player.

    • getPersonalID

      int getPersonalID(String nickname)
      Gets the id of the PersonalGoalCard assigned to a Player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      Returns:
      The id of the PersonalGoalCard of the player with nickname nickname.

    • resetTilesSelected

      void resetTilesSelected()
      Resets the Items selected by the current PLayer from the LivingRoom.
